items.title: Trump's deadline arrives for Putin to agree to a ceasefire or face sanctions
items.description: President Donald Trump's deadline is here for Russia's Vladimir Putin to agree to a ceasefire with Ukraine or face secondary sanctions.

items.title: Intel CEO responds after Trump calls for his resignation
items.description: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan says he’s “always operated within the highest legal and ethical standards” after coming under pressure following President Donald...

items.title: WATCH:  Young children transported for urgent medical treatment amid Israel-Hamas war
items.description: ABC News' Ian Pannell spoke to a mother and father from Gaza whose young children will be traveling to Jordan for urgent medical treatment.

items.title: WATCH:  Passengers cry out in horror as water slide malfunction injures cruise ship guest
items.description: The guest, whose condition is stable, received medical attention and is being treated for injuries.

items.title: WATCH:  Trump declines to recommit to Aug. 8 as ceasefire deadline for Putin
